name: The Email Company Inc.
description:
Welcome to your new job at The Email Company Inc.!

I'll be honest, things aren't looking too good in regards to cybersecurity. That's why you're here!

We need you to sort through our intercepted Emails and demonstrate your knowledge of spam and phishing attacks to sort the good apples from the bad ones!

Don't worry, we have a small guide available to refresh and give a quick explanation of the different types of bad Emails.

Take your time, but remember that you have 1 minute and 20 seconds to sort through all 11, randomly-generated Emails. Your score is directly influenced by how many you get right and how fast you catch them! You can always try to get a better score!

This game was made during SecurityGames.io's Cybersecurity gamejam and falls under the theme of "End-point Security".

Music:

Merry Bay by Ghostrifter Official | https://soundcloud.com/ghostrifter-official

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
